text: Foster the People is an American pop rock band from Los Angeles, California. Foster the People have four members: Mark Foster, Isom Innis, Mark Pontius, and Sean Cimino. Their best known song is "Pumped Up Kicks" which was released on September 14, 2010 and reached #1 on Billboard's Alternative Songs chart, #3 on the Rock Songs tally and #3 on the Billboard Hot 100. == Discography == So far as of 2014, Foster the People has released 2 Studio albums and 1 EP: In March 2014 the group Debuted their second album Supermodel (Foster the People Album) ===Albums=== *Torches (2011) *Supermodel (2014) *Sacred Hearts Club (2017) *Paradise State of Mind (2024) ===EPs=== *Foster the People (2011) *Spotify Sessions (2014) *III (2017) *Pick U Up (2019) == Other websites == *Official website Category:American pop music groups Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Foster the People
